ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of DAVID McAUSLAND of Beaconsfield, Quebec, to the position of Special Advisor to the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, as Chairperson of the RCMP Reform Implementation Council, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
